statements: SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner, nft_creation_date FROM NFTs;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner FROM NFTs WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT nft_name, nft_creation_date FROM NFTs ORDER BY nft_creation_date DESC;
SELECT nft_owner, COUNT(*) FROM NFTs GROUP BY nft_owner;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice' ORDER BY nft_creation_date DESC;
SELECT nft_name, nft_creation_date FROM NFTs WHERE nft_owner = 'Bob' ORDER BY nft_creation_date ASC;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner FROM NFTs WHERE nft_creation_date > '2021-01-01' AND nft_creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT nft_owner, COUNT(nft_id) AS nft_count FROM NFTs GROUP BY nft_owner HAVING COUNT(nft_id) > 1;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM nft_creation_date) AS year_created FROM NFTs WHERE nft_owner = 'Charlie';
SELECT * FROM nfts;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id, nft_id FROM nfts ORDER BY nft_id DESC;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name FROM nfts WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, nft_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM nfts WHERE nft_name LIKE 'Crypto%' ORDER BY nft_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, owner_id FROM nfts WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, transaction_date FROM nfts JOIN transactions ON nfts.nft_id = transactions.nft_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM nfts WHERE nft_id IN (SELECT nft_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-06-01');
SELECT nft_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY nft_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM nfts;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner FROM nfts WHERE nft_owner = 'd77e44f6-e459-4b78-9383-88baab1a56ff';
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner FROM nfts ORDER BY nft_owner DESC;
SELECT nft_name FROM nfts WHERE nft_owner = '39bfeb9b-c41d-4f07-a8f5-aa0227d05746' AND nft_id = 'd77e44f6-e459-4b78-9383-88baab1a56ff';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM nfts
SELECT nft_id, nft_owner FROM nfts WHERE nft_name = 'Art NFT'
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_type, nh.history_date FROM transactions t JOIN nft_history nh ON t.nft_id = nh.nft_id
SELECT nft_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM nfts JOIN transactions ON nfts.nft_id = transactions.nft_id GROUP BY nft_name
SELECT nft_name, MAX(history_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM nfts JOIN nft_history ON nfts.nft_id = nft_history.nft_id
SELECT * FROM nfts;
SELECT nft_name, nft_description FROM nfts WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, owner_id FROM nfts ORDER BY nft_id DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, n.nft_name FROM transactions t JOIN nfts n ON t.nft_id = n.nft_id;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, th.history_description FROM users u JOIN transaction_history th ON u.user_id = th.user_id JOIN transactions t ON th.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM nfts;
SELECT nft_name, nft_description FROM nfts WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, nfts.nft_name, transactions.amount FROM users INNER JOIN nfts ON users.user_id = nfts.owner_id INNER JOIN transactions ON nfts.nft_id = transactions.nft_id;
SELECT users.username, transaction_history.history_description FROM users LEFT JOIN transaction_history ON users.user_id = transaction_history.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 2;
SELECT nfts.nft_name, transactions.transaction_date FROM nfts INNER JOIN transactions ON nfts.nft_id = transactions.nft_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT token_id, owner_address FROM NFTs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, transaction_id, transaction_type FROM Transactions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT nft_id, metadata FROM NFTMetadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT token_id, owner_address FROM NFTs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nft_id, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'transfer' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT timestamp, details FROM TransactionDetails WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT metadata FROM NFTMetadata WHERE nft_id = 3;
